underlying_goal: Observe and record structured memory observations from a primary Claude session that was exploring the Rohan fortune-telling content production system's 8-step workflow, frontend form structure, and STEP 8 filtering bug fix plan
brief_summary: User fed observed primary session events (code reads, greps, task outputs) to the memory agent, which successfully created structured XML observations documenting the Rohan 8-step workflow system, frontend form mappings, API endpoints, and STEP 8 bug fix plan.
